TopicTitle: Limbo is free to activate on Steam today.

Articles.Content:
Thought I mention it, in case it interests someone. I missed it back than, but I remember critics loved it.

Edited June 21, 2016 by Evanitis
I own it.  Some of the control movements required are at times insane.  Insane?  Well, that describes the game too, eh?

I own the boxed retail copy which came with red/cyan glasses.  Press Shift+3+d for awesomeness.

It's a fairly short but interesting game, and seeing that they're giving it away for free, go get it!
I played this on the iPad a few years ago, it's one of my favorite games on the iPad. I would strongly recommend it.
I owned the game too. Also, play the game for its artistic touch, and get your mind bended about what the world your character move around represents.
Good game, I got it in a Humble Bundle a while back. One of the few games where dying is more entertaining than frustrating...
